species.name: crocalor
descriptions: The combination of Crocalor’s fire energy and overflowing vitality has caused an egg-shaped fireball to appear on the Pokémon’s head.
The valve in Crocalor’s flame sac is closely connected to its vocal cords. This Pokémon utters a guttural cry as it spews flames every which way.

abilities.name: blaze
abilities.effect: Strengthens fire moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max HP or less.

abilities.name: unaware
abilities.effect: Ignores other Pokémon's stat modifiers for damage and accuracy calculation.
